hero.subtitle: Computer Engineering Student and Java Developer.
hero.quote: “Passionate about software, continuous learning, and technological challenges.”

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I have always been fascinated by how technology can transform ideas into real solutions that impact people's lives. That passion led me to study Computer Engineering at the University of Seville, a path I am about to complete.
about.p2: For me, programming is not just writing code: it is an exercise in creativity, logic, and problem-solving, a way to build useful and purposeful tools.
about.p3: After completing my first professional experience at Tier 1 Technology, I find myself at a key moment: I am looking for a new challenge that allows me to continue growing as a developer. I am passionate about backend development with Java and Spring Boot, but what really motivates me is continuous learning, exploring new technologies, and adding value within a team that shares the same vision of innovation.

job1.task1: Development of custom applications with Java and Spring Boot.
job1.task2: Creation and maintenance of REST APIs.
job1.task5: Active collaboration in a team under agile methodologies.

job2.task2: Support to the development team in various tasks.

job3.role: Creation of an online store (Santander Scholarship)
job3.task1: Creation and management of e-commerce with Prestashop.

degree1.title: Computer Engineering, major in Software Engineering

course5.title: Online Course on Hibernate and JPA 14H

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: To show my ambition and future focus, I have used AI to generate a statement of my professional aspirations.

socialmovie.title: SocialMovies
socialmovie.description: Android app to check movie information from the TMDB API, save favorites, and follow friends. Developed with Java, Kotlin, and Firebase.

libreria.title: Online Bookstore
libreria.description: Professional mini e-commerce built with React + TypeScript + Vite for selling books. The project demonstrates architectural patterns similar to Angular (feature-based modularization, injectable services, guards, lazy loading) and a robust DX-oriented approach.

notas.title: Tasks & Notes
notas.description: Web application to manage tasks and notes aimed at people who want to learn modern Angular with a real practical case. The project incorporates standalone components, Signals, Angular Material, i18n, and dual persistence strategies to cover a professional end-to-end workflow.

projects.prompt: Click the button to generate a projection of my future skills and areas of interest.

errors.title: Error
errors.description: There was a problem generating the projection. Please try again.
errors.fallback: I will soon be showing my personal projects here. I am learning new technologies and will soon share complete applications in frontend, cloud, and artificial intelligence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or have a question? Do not hesitate to contact me. I am open to new opportunities and always willing to connect with other professionals.

validation.name: The name must be at least 2 characters long.
validation.message: The message must be at least 10 characters long.

toast.title: Message Sent!
toast.description: Thank you for contacting me. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
